thread.title: BRIEF-Cromwell Property Group Says HY Profit Attributable $‍80.8​ Mln

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Cromwell Property Group Says HY Profit Attributable $‍80.8​ Mln

organizations.name: brief-cromwell property group says hy profit attributable

text:
Feb 28 (Reuters) - Cromwell Property Group:
* HY REVENUE AND OTHER INCOME $ 270.5 MILLION VERSUS $244.9 MILLION
* HY PROFIT AFTER TAX ATTRIBUTABLE $‍80.8​ MILLION VERSUS $153.2 MILLION
* H1 DISTRIBUTIONS PER STAPLED SECURITY 4.2 CENTS * ‍RETURNS FROM PROPERTY INVESTMENT SEGMENT ARE EXPECTED TO REMAIN LOWER IN 2018​
* ‍2018 DISTRIBUTIONS EXPECTED TO REMAIN STEADY & IN LINE WITH TOTAL ANNUAL DISTRIBUTION OF 8.34 CENTS
* SEES 2018 ‍OPERATING PROFIT OF 8.25 CENTS PER STAPLED SECURITY​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
